item.title: Etan Patz Murder Suspect: 'It's Like Something Just Took Over Me' - NBCNews.com
item.description:
NBCNews.com
Etan Patz Murder Suspect: 'It's Like Something Just Took Over Me'
NBCNews.com
The alleged killer of Etan Patz said in a taped confession played in court today that he tried to stop choking the 6-year-old but couldn't. "It was like something just took over me," said suspect Pedro Hernandez on the three-hour tape, as Patz's father listened.
